short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to access your Euphoria web phone anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Euphoria Phone Chrome Extension allows you to access the phone dialpad of your Euphoria extension in the Telephone Management System (TMS). You donâ€™t have to activate or configure this extension in any way as it automatically, all you need to do is log into the TMS, and choose your extension. The extension can show progress of a call, and end a call without having to be on the TMS tab.
